name: New Program Provides Firefighting Training to Ramona High Students
description: San Diego County Fire/CAL FIRE has partnered with Ramona High School to provide students with firefighting skills and education. Offered through the school’s Career Technical Education Program, the new Fire Technology courses combine classroom instruction with hands-on training to prepare students to respond to structure fires and wildfires.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office
